item.description:
(Cross-posted from Facebook.  Non-students welcome too, of course!)


Spring is the time for love and this spring who can college students not love more than the great savior of their economic futures: Ben Bernanke. Join us to raise a toast to the man whose actions influence so much of our lives, our children's lives, our unborn children's lives, our unborn granchildren's lives, our unborn great, ahem, you get the idea..


We invite all college students out including and most especially the liberty groups at our local universities. A send-off for the summer interns and those graduating!


More on the Facebook event page: https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=168250229899407
item.how_to_find_us: Just yell "quantitative easing" ... or something like that :)

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty Drinks Summer Collegiate Sendoff (Thank the Bernank for the Economy)
